## hpr1319 :: Frank Bell Presents HPR to His LUG

 Links from the show:

Frank's LUG, the Tidewater Unix Users Group, https://twuug.org/mediawiki/index.php/Main_Page


Podcast and sites mentioned in the show:


Geek News Central: https://www.geeknewscentral.com/

GNU World Order: https://gnuworldorder.info/

TwaTech (Today with a Tecchie): https://twatech.org/

BinRev (the Binary Revolution): https://www.binrev.com/forums/

The Sunday Morning Linux Review: https://smlr.us/
